scores.baseline:
# Palindrome Detection Algorithm

## Simple Approach (Two-Pointer)

```python
def is_palindrome(s):
    left, right = 0, len(s) - 1
    
    while left < right:
        if s[left] != s[right]:
            return False
        left += 1
        right -= 1
    
    return True
```
